name: Vespa ZX 125
description: The Vespa ZX 125 is powered by 124.45cc BS6 engine which develops a power of 9.78 bhp and a torque of 9.60 Nm.This ZX 125 scooter weighs 114 kg and has a fuel tank capacity of 7.4 liters.

name: Vespa VXL 150
description: The styling of the Vespa VXL 150 harks back to the retro design of the old-school Vespa scooters, which gives it a simple and clean look. The Vespa VXL 150 is powered by 149.5cc BS6 engine which develops a power of 10.32 bhp and a torque of 10.60 Nm.

name: Vespa Elegante 150
description: The Vespa Elegante is a special edition model that Piaggio launched a few years ago. The Vespa Elegante 150 is powered by 149.5cc BS6 engine which develops a power of 10.32 bhp and a torque of 10.60 Nm.

name: Vespa SXL 125
description: The SXL 125 features a classic design which is in tune with the Italian marque’s retro character. The Vespa SXL 125 is powered by 124.45cc BS6 engine which develops a power of 9.78 bhp and a torque of 9.60 Nm.

name: Vespa VXL 125
description: The VXL 125 is amongst the most affordable models in Vespa’s India line-up. It is available in only 1 variant and 8 colours. The Vespa VXL 125 is powered by 124.45cc BS6 engine which develops a power of 9.78 bhp and a torque of 9.60 Nm.
